A1 	# Version number of the file format.

####
# Data categories include: 
# InParm, RAT, 
# A_l, A_z, Rd_r, Rd_a, Tt_r, Tt_a, 
# A_rz, Rd_ra, Tt_ra 
####

# User time:       12 sec =     0.00 hr.   Simulation time of this run.

InParm 			# Input parameters. cm is used.
bli.txt 	A		# output file name, ASCII.
10000000 0			# No. of photons
0.0001	0.0001		# dz, dr [cm]
1	100	1	# No. of dz, dr, da.

1					# Number of layers
#n	mua	mus	g	d	# One line for each layer
1					# n for medium above
1.4	20	2000	0.7	1E+008	# layer 1
1					# n for medium below

RAT #Reflectance, absorption, transmission. 
0.0277778      	#Specular reflectance [-]
0.423974       	#Diffuse reflectance [-]
0.548248       	#Absorbed fraction [-]
0              	#Transmittance [-]

      0.5482
